_header: My heart is left on the land
Subjects: farewells, lovers’; commemorative verse, lovers’; lovers, death of
_description: Mourning for a dead beloved — one cross-rhymed quatrain

CamTCC1184.Transcription:
My hart is leuit one þe landin lugyne with my lade dereMy
                    body is one þe see salandwith sorofull hart & seghing so
                    sere
CamTCC1184.Note: Added to lower margin of page by a sixteenth-century hand.
